    • Method Detail

      • setModel

        public void setModel​(java.lang.String currentLevel,
                     java.lang.Integer score)

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        At start up of the display call upon the model to get the data and then set it to display. If the score is null, then the user has not just completed a game (they came from main menu) If the score is non-null they have come from a game and can save their score.

      • submitClick

        private void submitClick()
        Adds a new high score to the table.

      • setDisable

        private void setDisable()
        Disables the submit and text filed once a user has submitted a value or if they are simply viewing the table from main menu.

      • returnClick

        private void returnClick()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Return back to main menu.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
